nodes.title: Learn the basics of TypeScript
nodes.desc: Understand the fundamentals of TypeScript, including its syntax, data types, and type annotations. [TypeScript Handbook](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/basic-types.html)

nodes.title: Understand the benefits of TypeScript
nodes.desc: Recognize the advantages of using TypeScript, such as improved code maintainability, scalability, and error prevention. [TypeScript Benefits](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/benefits.html)

nodes.title: Use a code editor or IDE
nodes.desc: Learn how to use a code editor or IDE, such as Visual Studio Code or IntelliJ, to write and debug TypeScript code. [TypeScript Editor Support](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/editor-support.html)

nodes.title: Debug and test code
nodes.desc: Learn how to debug and test TypeScript code, including using the debugger and writing unit tests. [TypeScript Debugging](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/debugging.html)

nodes.title: Use a build tool or bundler
nodes.desc: Learn how to use a build tool or bundler, such as Webpack or Rollup, to compile and bundle TypeScript code. [TypeScript Build Tools](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/build-tools.html)

nodes.title: Deploy and optimize code
nodes.desc: Learn how to deploy and optimize TypeScript code, including using techniques such as tree shaking and minification. [TypeScript Deployment](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/deployment.html)

nodes.title: Learn about popular frameworks and libraries
nodes.desc: Understand how to use popular frameworks and libraries, such as React, Angular, and Vue.js, with TypeScript. [TypeScript Frameworks](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/frameworks.html)

nodes.title: Participate in the TypeScript community
nodes.desc: Learn how to participate in the TypeScript community, including contributing to open-source projects and attending conferences. [TypeScript Community](https://www.typescriptlang.org/community/)

nodes.title: Stay up-to-date with the latest developments
nodes.desc: Learn how to stay up-to-date with the latest developments in TypeScript, including new features and best practices. [TypeScript Blog](https://www.typescriptlang.org/blog/)

nodes.title: Set up a TypeScript project
nodes.desc: Learn how to create a new TypeScript project, including installing the necessary tools and configuring the development environment. [TypeScript Setup](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/setup.html)

nodes.title: Learn about TypeScript types
nodes.desc: Understand the different types in TypeScript, including primitive types, object types, and type guards. [TypeScript Types](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/type-compatibility.html)

nodes.title: Master interfaces and type aliases
nodes.desc: Learn how to define and use interfaces and type aliases to create reusable and maintainable code. [TypeScript Interfaces](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/interfaces.html)

nodes.title: Understand classes and inheritance
nodes.desc: Learn how to define and use classes, including inheritance and polymorphism. [TypeScript Classes](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/classes.html)

nodes.title: Learn about generics and type parameters
nodes.desc: Understand how to use generics and type parameters to create reusable and flexible code. [TypeScript Generics](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/generics.html)

nodes.title: Master modules and imports
nodes.desc: Learn how to organize and structure code using modules and imports. [TypeScript Modules](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/modules.html)

nodes.title: Understand type inference and type checking
nodes.desc: Learn how TypeScript infers types and checks code for errors. [TypeScript Type Checking](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/type-checking.html)

nodes.title: Learn about advanced type features
nodes.desc: Understand advanced type features, including conditional types, mapped types, and type manipulation. [TypeScript Advanced Types](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/advanced-types.html)
